body.name: Shintenchi Small Modern Loveseat Couch Sofa, Light Grey, 2-Seat, Mid Century Fabric Upholstered, Tool-Free Assembly
features: Great seating: The 47“ loveseat is crafted from strong wood and features a high-density spongy cushion finish. Also the high-density sponge cushion is soft and comfortable, providing ultimate seating comfort and cushion durability to last!

Charming Sofa: We love the tiny sofa's mid-century modern design. Also we provide 5 popular chic colors for you to choose. This mini couch is colorful and versatile enough to be placed in anywhere you need:bedroom,living room,studio, apartment,cafe etc

Small Space Solution: Don’t doubt that our small sofa is definitely a small space solution. Light weight design but durable enough for daily using.This small couch with upholstered sponge,human design, 2 pillows, offer you comfy touch. This sofa is a pretty addition to small space.

Quick installation: Tool-free assembly, this tiny couch is pretty easy to put together. Just have to connect the parts and screw the legs on, can be installed in less than 20 minutes.Came in one box, included: 2-seat small sofa with 2 same color pillows.

Tips: Since this is a small loveseat, please confirm the size meets your needs before ordering. Dimensions: 47.2" W x 25.6" D x 30.3" H, Seat Height 17.7", Seat Depth: 21.3", Weight capacity: 350 lbs,Simple assembly required.
body.description: With extended armrests, sturdy wooden legs, this new shintenchi loveseat is the perfect combination of comfort and style.And this is a good small space solution for you, without wasting every space in your home. Also we offer a variety of beautiful colors for you to choose to meet any decoration and occasion, we believe it will gladly serve your leisure time.Product Details Material: Wood FrameColor：Green, Black, Brown, Dark Grey, Light GreyLevel of Assembly: Full Assembly NeededIncluded: 2-Seat sofa，2 Throw PillowWeight capacity: 350 lbs Tips Instructions before buy 1.Please confirm whether the size of our products meets your requirements before you buy it2.Please note that there is a little color difference between the object and your monitor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Awesome little couch. It can fit one full size adult comfortably. I can sit on it together with my daughter too but the max weight limit is not too much so be careful. The size is much more like an oversized chair that is a bit low to the ground.The product comes exactly as shown with all the pieces needed to put it together. Very easy to put it together for the most part. It took about 15 minutes to attach the legs and one of the arm rests. Other armrest is already attached. Many people are saying the back is not sturdy and this is because of the way the pieces come to attach the back. You will need to do a lot of puzzle work to fit the back pieces together but once you do the back IS perfectly sturdy. Otherwise, if you don't want to spend time doing that it will sit comfortably against a wall as well.Couch is very well made and comfortable. Does not feel cheap at all. A little less cushion in the back rest than the seat but still comfortable. If you need a small seating in your house, this is a good choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a cheap, small couch worth the buy
reviews.reviewText: The couch is more like an oversized chair, it's quite firm and comfortable, it fits one adult nicely, however the putting the back of it together can be problematic, I just make sure the back is supported by my wall, to make it more stable, it is also surprisingly not that heavy, I was able to put it together by myself, overall it's a cheap, very small couch, but worth the buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: It's a small loveseat, but it's cute and so far it's sturdy. It was surprisingly comfortable. It's a perfect fit for my small living space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love my Loveseat!
reviews.reviewText: Great loveseat for a small room, easy to install, beautiful color, very comfortable and a great size for my daughter's bedroom.highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's small and firm
reviews.reviewText: It is reasonable for the price. The local retail store had some similarly priced on discount, but I couldn't fit it in my car. This box is small and densely packed. The attachments appear odd and slide together easily, but leave some gaps. The couch itself is pretty small. We will see how it holds up to time.It's not the most comfortable couch, either. Good for watching a show, but not laying down or taking a nap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute small loveseat
reviews.reviewText: I just received my loveseat today. Putting it together was very simple and easy. I bought a cover the ZNSAYOTX Super Stretch Chair Slipcover Universal Sofa Chair Covers for Living Room Dogs Pet Furniture Protector Spandex Armchair Slipcovers with Anti Slip Foam Sticks (Coffee, Chair). The cover is not the color I was hoping for but will still works.After putting it together I sat for a few hours and watched TV. It's comfortable for the cost, ease, and size. I mainly bought this for my dogs, as the memory foam beds I bought they no longer enjoy as they sink and have a hard time getting out of them. There are getting elderly have a hard time getting around sometimes.The first 2 photos show the care of of the packaging, a strip of cardboard was added so if using a blade to open it wouldn't cut the material.The 3rd photo shows the size in our living room. The rest of the photos show it was approved by my babies Rave (pitty 57 pounds) and Tiny (beagle/cairn terrier mix 27 pounds). We'll see how it holds up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Baffled by other reviews
reviews.reviewText: Other reviews made me think this was a great item. I’m short… sitting on this makes me feel like a giant. It’s very small, sits very low to the ground. I feel like I bought a couch for toddlers. After Christmas I will be buying something different. And it’s hard as rock.It shipped quickly, went together quickly and easily. Cute for a toddlers play room or maybe child therapist waiting area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, cute, sturdy
reviews.reviewText: More comfortable than I expected. Perfect for our little office.
